name: Green King of Vegetables
description:
Prologue

At first, I didn’t want to participate in this jam at all, but then I fortunately changed my mind. I came up with a concept and started to implement it. I realized after the first day that it would be too large for this short period of time. I didn’t finish the gameplay until the second day. After that, I made models, textures, animations, effects, etc. … and I did the balancing in the last hour. Unfortunately, there was no time left for audio, so I had to do Opt-out in that category.

All in all, I really had a lot of fun during this time. ❤

The Game

Essentially, this game is a simple top-down shooter. You play as a cucumber that is hunting other vegetable characters. By doing this, it sacrifices them to the “harvest god” in order to avoid being harvested itself. If the offerings are too low, the game ends. However, if you offer a lot, you will be rewarded... 🔥
